elements.label: The 9th King Henry's Own Rifles
elements.description: On paper, this regiment fights for Great Britain and her Allies. But why has this column diverted from the main force? Why are they pursuing my prize? The King on the Isle is a ill-omened figure - perhaps he sees opportunity in seizing what I seek for his own ends. [Enemies of this faction will also sometimes target Enemies from the Légion du Seuil.]

elements.label: The Légion du Seuil
elements.description: A brutal army that keeps a brutal peace in the Bounds. They rarely fight their wars on this side of the dream - so why have they come? Perhaps this particular contingent has received orders to send my prize back to the sky. Perhaps something more personal is at play. [Enemies of this faction will also sometimes target Enemies from the 9th Rifles.]

elements.label: Coordinated
elements.description: Stronger in numbers. [This Enemy can call in the assistance of other Coordinated Enemies when attacking you.]

elements.label: Explosive
elements.description: Out with a bang. [Upon being slain, this Enemy will explode violently, wounding you or a random Ally or Enemy on the board.]

elements.label: Retaliatory
elements.description: This one knows how to repay an injury. [When you successfully attack this Enemy, they are likely to deal you a wound in return.]

elements.label: A Chain
elements.description: A very long time ago, I swore myself to an ancient power of the earth. It made me strong; it made me more than mortal; it bound me in servitude. If I intend to become different - greater - I must shatter these bonds.

elements.label: Guarding: Jerome
elements.description: This Enemy has been ordered to guarantee the safety of an important someone. [This Enemy protects Jerome Alexander.]

elements.label: Guarding: Lionel
elements.description: This Enemy has been ordered to guarantee the safety of an important someone. [This Enemy protects Lionel Saxon.]

elements.label: Wounded
elements.description: Enough of these will kill anyone. Mostly anyone.
